Name: PANDARA
About the game: An exceedingly simple 2D scrolling shooter. Press Z to shoot. Press X to change speed. Defeat enemies to gain experience and power up. If you make mistakes, your defense will improve. >BILINGUAL Japanese and English story. >GAMEPAD Some gamepads can be used, but they are not fully supported. Xinput (Z key: A button, X key: B button) Sometimes the movement is set to 4-way input. Please select joystick movement in the controller settings. >SYNOPSIS What went wrong? When the box opened, all color drained out of the world. This greyness blankets everything, and the emperor brings judgment upon all from the unreachable sky. Anything that has the potential to threaten the peace is removed soundlessly. The animals have always known only black and white, and they have chosen to fight. They fight to destroy the woman who opened the box... Wiseman 31 Cleare. * Cat bazooka character design * Emilia kuzyou
